img_above_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-ruyi-scroll.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2a/Black-myth-wukong-ruyi-scroll.jpg)  1 | Ruyi Scroll | Legendary | A scroll gifted by Chen Loong that leads to a secluded and tranquil retreat | • Obtained from Chen Loong after defeating him in The New West and getting the Special-made Bone-Strengening Pellet from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge upon Chen Long Asking
• Used automatically at Chen Loong to gain access to the Zodiac Village | Not craftable | Ruyi Scroll
img_below_text:
• 1 Celestial Pear | Body-Fleeting Powder
![Black-myth-wukong-enhanced-ginseng-pellets.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/46/Black-myth-wukong-enhanced-ginseng-pellets.jpg)| Enhanced Ginseng Pellets | Legendary | Upon use, instantly grants a large amount of Focus | • Formula obtained by in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed Hollow, head towards the lanterns and through the gate nearby to find the item in a chest • Purchased from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge| • 1 Tree Pearl
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-ruyi-scroll.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2a/Black-myth-wukong-ruyi-scroll.jpg)  1 | Ruyi Scroll | Legendary | A scroll gifted by Chen Loong that leads to a secluded and tranquil retreat | • Obtained from Chen Loong after defeating him in The New West and getting the Special-made Bone-Strengening Pellet from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge upon Chen Long Asking
• Used automatically at Chen Loong to gain access to the Zodiac Village | Not craftable | Ruyi Scroll"
        - Following Text: "• 1 Celestial Pear | Body-Fleeting Powder
![Black-myth-wukong-enhanced-ginseng-pellets.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/46/Black-myth-wukong-enhanced-ginseng-pellets.jpg)| Enhanced Ginseng Pellets | Legendary | Upon use, instantly grants a large amount of Focus | • Formula obtained by in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed Hollow, head towards the lanterns and through the gate nearby to find the item in a chest • Purchased from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge| • 1 Tree Pearl"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely a consumable or craftable object. Based on the surrounding text, it is associated with items such as the Ruyi Scroll and Enhanced Ginseng Pellets, which are legendary items used for progression or enhancing gameplay. The ornate design suggests it may hold significance in the game's narrative or mechanics, possibly tied to healing, focus restoration, or unlocking areas.
